FuncDef: This command configures the duration that allows the PIM-snooping switch to snoop all the PIM states in the VPLS. During this duration, multicast traffic is flooded in the VPLS. At the end of this duration, multicast traffic is forwarded using the snooped states.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the PIM snooping hold time, in seconds. Values-0 to 300. ParamDefault: Default- 90
